摔.definition: to throw down; to fall; to drop and break

摔倒.definition: to fall down; to slip and fall; to throw sb to the ground

摔傷.definition: to injure oneself in a fall

摔打.definition: to knock; to grasp sth in the hand and beat it; to toughen oneself up

摔斷.definition: to fall and break; to break (bones) by falling

摔死.definition: to fall to one's death; to kill by throwing to the ground

摔破.definition: to fall and smash into pieces

摔跟頭.definition: to fall; fig. to suffer a setback

摔跤.definition: to trip and fall; to wrestle; wrestling (sports)
